parameters.param:
KTOR_VERSION="$(cat ktor_version.txt)" DOMAIN="$(cat CNAME)" WORK_DIR="output"
# Prepare working directory cp -rf template "${WORK_DIR}" cat > "${WORK_DIR}/_config.yml" <<- EOF
title: "Ktor $KTOR_VERSION" description: Asynchronous framework for web applications url: "https://$DOMAIN" baseurl: /$KTOR_VERSION/
source: . destination: ../$KTOR_VERSION
ktor_version: $KTOR_VERSION
markdown: kramdown exclude: - Gemfile - Gemfile.lock plugins: - jekyll-sitemap
EOF
cp -rf apidoc/* "${WORK_DIR}"
# Prepare result directory mkdir -p "${KTOR_VERSION}"
# Generate files via Jekyll # docker run -v "${PWD}:/srv/jekyll" -v "${PWD}/vendor/bundle:/usr/local/bundle" -w "/srv/jekyll/doc-output" jekyll/jekyll whoami docker run -v "${PWD}:/srv/jekyll" -v "${PWD}/vendor/bundle:/usr/local/bundle" -w "/srv/jekyll/doc-output" jekyll/jekyll cat /etc/passwd docker run -v "${PWD}:/srv/jekyll" -v "${PWD}/vendor/bundle:/usr/local/bundle" -w "/srv/jekyll/doc-output" jekyll/jekyll groups jekyll #docker run -v "${PWD}:/srv/jekyll" -v "${PWD}/vendor/bundle:/usr/local/bundle" -w "/srv/jekyll/${WORK_DIR}" jekyll/jekyll\ # /bin/bash -c "chown -R jekyll:jekyll /srv/jekyll/${WORK_DIR}; jekyll b '$*'"
ls -la "${KTOR_VERSION}"
